Text: LRCIReliant Sale Assumption Parish Louisiana Property Cc Gerald this will confirm our telephone conversation earlier this morning in which you advised me that EnronLRCI would have no objection to my firm representing Reliant in connection with the referenced matter I shall look forward to working with you in bringing this matter to a successful conclusion Should you have any questions as this matter proceeds please do not hesitate to contact me James R Conway III Lemle Kelleher LLP PanAmerican Life Center st Floor Poydras Street New Orleans LA Phone Fax Email
